scripts.dev: npm run mysql:stop; npm run mysql:start && npm run mysql:check && nodemon index.js
scripts.mysql:start: export FLAG=-d DB_NAME=project_db && npm run mysql:run
scripts.mysql:start:log: export FLAG=-it DB_NAME=project_db && npm run mysql:run
scripts.mysql:run: docker run $FLAG --rm -p 3306:3306 -v $(pwd)/schema:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d --name=mysql-sandbox -e MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD=root -e MYSQL_DATABASE=$DB_NAME mysql:8 mysqld --authentication_policy=mysql_native_password
scripts.mysql:check: until docker exec mysql-sandbox mysql -e "use project_db; show tables;"; do echo ...; sleep 1; done
